description: Reversion back to the old file. The previous one uploaded was no different in both the guitar and bass tracks, and the drums were most definitely incorrect. The vocals, lyrics and rhythm guitar were also removed in the previous revision. Hence, the change.

description: Improved drums using the isolated track found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3PRQ8-7gb-Q
title: Crazy Train

description:
Changes were made based on listening to an isolated guitar track at slower speeds.
- Trivial changes to the rhythm of the palm muted A string during the verses
- Corrected the riff transitioning the verse to the chorus. (measure 35) It should be correct now.
- Tied the third A chord to the second in the 5th measure of the chorus (measure 41, 75, 141)
- Changed the octave that the E5 chord in measures 45 and 79
- Added the high note to the A chord in measure 62
- Corrected measures 124 and 128 so the bend is held and the A chord isn't played like normally
- Added slides in the section just before the solo and during the outro
- Changes to the solo. Most are changes to rhythm, bends, adding vibrato, etc.
- Differentiated between finger slides and pick slides/scrapes.
- Changed how measures 46, 80, and 146 are played. Also added a slide on 46 and 146 in the rhythm guitar track there.
title: Crazy Train

description: Removed notes in first seven bars of "Randy Rhoads - Lead" (addressing "Have you ever listened to Crazy Train? there is no guitar in the intro, it comes in during the feedback/pickslide thing." error); added chords (addressing "Chords would be nice.") but changed them from the D/F# notation guitarpro wanted to use since the bass notes were not the root ... D/F# is a D chord so i changed the notation that way.
